name: wand of fire
description: This is a short wand, engraved with various red runes. It is capable of sending forth a blast of fire.

name: wand of ice
description: This is a short wand, engraved with various blue runes. It is capable of sending forth a whirlwind of frost.

name: wand of thunder
description: This is a short wand, engraved with various light blue runes. It is capable of sending forth a bolt of lightning.

name: wand of necromancy
description: The skull of a small animal has been placed upon the tip of this wand, and is engraved with errie sigils. Using it can raise the dead, but be careful with it.

name: wand of charm
description: This wand has been carefully decorated with several feather and shiny objects. Using it can charm monsters and beasts alike.
